snippet: Hezbollah in Iraq claimed responsibility for the attack on the camp, which houses members of Mujahedeen Khalq, or M.E.K., an Iranian opposition group.
abstract: Six people are killed and more than 50 are wounded when several dozen mortar shells fall on refugee camp in Baghdad for members of Iranian opposition group Mujahedeen Khalq; Hezbollah in Iraq claims responsibility.
lead_paragraph: Hezbollah in Iraq claimed responsibility for the attack on the camp, which houses members of Mujahedeen Khalq, or M.E.K., an Iranian opposition group.

headline.seo: 6 Killed in Shelling of Refugee Camp in Iraq
headline.main: Six Killed in Shelling of Iranian Refugee Camp in Iraq
headline.print_headline: Six Killed in Shelling of Iranian Refugee Camp in Iraq
